title: Mid-term Exam Schedule Released
content: The mid-term examination schedule for Spring 2024 has been published. Please check the academic portal for your individual timetable and exam venues.

title: Holiday Notice - Republic Day
content: The college will remain closed on January 26th in observance of Republic Day. All classes and examinations scheduled for this date are postponed.

title: Assignment Submission Reminder
content: This is a reminder that your Data Structures assignment is due tomorrow at 11:59 PM. Late submissions will incur a penalty.

title: Guest Lecture on AI and Machine Learning
content: Join us for an exciting guest lecture by Dr. Sarah Johnson from MIT on 'Future of AI and Machine Learning' on February 2nd at 2 PM in Auditorium A.

title: Library Extended Hours During Exams
content: The library will be open 24/7 during the examination period from February 15th to March 15th to support student preparation.

title: Database Lab Session Rescheduled
content: The database lab session scheduled for Thursday has been moved to Friday 2-4 PM due to faculty unavailability.
